titleStmt.title: A call to delaying sinners; or The danger of delaying in matters concerning our souls. Being the substance of several sermons from Ps.119. v.60. / By Thomas Doolittle, minister of the gospel.
titleStmt.author: Doolittle, Thomas, 1632?-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Newman. and sold by E. Tracey at the three Bibles, on London Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Engraved portrait of Doolittle on frontispiece.
Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

place.placeName: the three Bibles, on London Bridge
